title: What are real gremlins supposed to look like? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Real” Gremlins - Gremlin - Wikipedia Depicted as small bestial humanoids with spiked wicked features, resembling imps and mischief demons from folklore. In practice, the whole point of the Gremlin folklore is that you never ever see them, only experience their sabotage and malicious mischief.

Scottish gremlin AKA Boggart.  South African gremlin AKA Tokoloshe.  gremlin - location unknown.  Spanish gremlin.  Norwegian gremlin.  gremlin.  Gremlin.  Gremlin from the Isle of Man.  gremlin from American Aboriginal people AKA the Wendigo.
